questions.question: Is this a HIPAA-covered entity or business associate?
questions.why: Determines BAA requirements, PHI handling obligations, and breach notification responsibilities

questions.question: What types of PHI will be processed (names, SSN, medical records, diagnoses)?
questions.why: Different PHI types have different protection requirements under the HIPAA Privacy Rule

questions.question: Who needs access to PHI and under what circumstances?
questions.why: HIPAA minimum necessary principle requires role-based access controls

questions.question: What PHI access audit logging is required?
questions.why: HIPAA requires 6-year retention of access logs and ability to track all PHI access

questions.question: What EHR/EMR system(s) will this integrate with?
questions.why: Determines API approach (HL7 FHIR vs proprietary), data transformation needs, and certification requirements

questions.question: What encryption requirements exist for PHI at rest and in transit?
questions.why: HIPAA Security Rule requires encryption as an addressable safeguard

questions.question: What is the breach notification process and timeline?
questions.why: HIPAA requires notification within 60 days; need incident response procedures

questions.question: Is this system subject to HITRUST certification requirements?
questions.why: HITRUST adds additional controls beyond HIPAA; affects architecture decisions

questions.question: Does this need to support CMS/Medicare reporting requirements?
questions.why: Medicare participation requires specific quality reporting and data formats

questions.question: What patient identity verification is required?
questions.why: Healthcare identity proofing often requires verification against external sources
